name: Chicken Fried Rice
description: A classic Asian lunch favorite, chicken fried rice is a delicious and satisfying dish.
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables (such as peas, carrots, and bell peppers)

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Fresh and flavorful, vegetable stir fry is a quick and healthy Asian lunch option.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (such as broccoli, bell peppers, and snap peas)

name: Tofu and Vegetable Soup
description: Warm and comforting, tofu and vegetable soup is a nourishing Asian lunch option.
ingredients: 2 cups leafy greens (such as spinach or bok choy)

name: Dumplings
description: Satisfy your cravings with these delicious dumplings, a popular Asian lunch choice.

name: Teriyaki Tofu Bowl
description: Healthy and flavorful, teriyaki tofu bowl is a satisfying Asian lunch option.

name: Vegetable Spring Rolls
description: Light and crunchy, vegetable spring rolls are a delicious Asian lunch option.
